text: @GeorgeTakei Nobody knew the extent of cases in Wuhan because they were not truthful to WHO. On Jan. 11th China stated they had 41 cases, we now know it was much higher. But go ahead and blame the President who started travel restrictions while Dems screamed it's racist.
